page.description: Detach current query (or named query if specified).
page.original:
&ltTBL>.QUERY_DETACH() Syntax &ltTBL>.QUERY_DETACH( [ Query_Name as C ] ) ArgumentDescription Query_NameOptional. The name of a query.
Description The &ltTBL>.QUERY_DETACH() method detaches the current or a named query. Example dim tbl as P dim inx as P tbl = table.open("customer") inx = tbl.query_primary_put("lastname") ? inx.records_get() = 60.000000 tbl.query_detach("lastname")
See Also Table Functions and Methods, Query Functions and Methods
